page.title: 09SHOPPING AREA STUDY
page.content: A study of 35 households in the village of Tremeirchion was carried out by the children of the village school.One question asked,where do you do your main weekly shopping,the results are as follows:_Twenty four people shop in Denbigh,Five people shop at Rhyl.Four people shop at ASDA Kimmel Bay,Two shop at Holywell and one do thair main weekly shopping at Rhuddlan.Why? Because it is more convenient.Because it is the nearest town.Because there are no shops in the village..Because it is cheaper. Because there is more choice and because the only bus route goes to Rhyl.At one time there used to be a Post Office in the village but that closed five years ago.
